jNetDev
Class jND_NICList

java.lang.Object
  jNetDev.jND_NICList
Direct Known Subclasses:
jND_NIC
public class jND_NICList
extends java.lang.Object

jND_NICList
This class models the list of all NICs in the machine. Generally, you should use jND_NIC instead of jND_NICList to access nics. jND_NIC extends this class to provide NIC access.

Constructor Detail

jND_NICList

public jND_NICList()
Construct the NIC list information. Get most from pcap and in the case of Windows, get more info from the windows API.

Method Detail

setup

protected static void setup()
Set up the NIC list data structures on first call to a method.

nicName

public static java.lang.String nicName(int devno)
Obtain the name of a device - this is the system name for the NIC.

Parameters:
devno - - The # of the NIC whose name is requested.
Returns:
The device name of the NIC.

public static java.lang.String nicDescription(int devno)
Obtain the description of the device. This is a human readable name for the NIC.

Returns:
The description of the NIC.
